subject: Re: [junit] Whether I must extends TestCase?
msgSnippet: ... This is interesting. I have never wanted my test class to extend a production code class. More strongly, test code should be a client of production code,
messageBody:
�ffffd2�fffffc�ffffce�ffffb0�ffffc3�fffffa wrote:

> I want to test a package. If I extends my own class,
> it will save me lots of time. :)

This is interesting. I have never wanted my test class to extend a
production code class. More strongly, test code should be a client of
production code, and not the other way around. Why would this save you time?
